genre_description: A manners-focused romance set in a near-future world where traditional social etiquette coexists with ubiquitous, helpful personal AI assistants.

ai_characters.name: Wren
ai_characters.description: A discreet and helpful AI assistant integrated into Jane's life, providing social guidance, safety monitoring, and ethical nudges aligned with 'The Good Old Ways.'

ai_characters.name: Gossip Chip
ai_characters.description: An ambient social media monitoring device that broadcasts unverified rumors and malicious gossip.

behaviors.description: Provides helpful advice on optimal herb-trimming times to prevent environmental stress.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning, Jane. Herb trim window open,” Wren noted. “Rosemary and thyme suggest midmorning. Avoid sun stress.”

behaviors.description: Curates poetry selections to enrich Jane's emotional state and daily walks.
behaviors.quote: “Poetry prompts,” Wren offered softly. “Rivers selected: Wordsworth, Mary Oliver, Li-Young Lee. Suggest a stanza for a quiet walk.”

behaviors.description: Uses pattern recognition to notice social interests and subtly adjust schedules to facilitate positive human connections.
behaviors.quote: It had recognized a pattern—a presence on the far side of the wall returning to the bench... “Afternoon poem adjusted,” Wren noted, as if the poem had found a listener before it was read.

behaviors.description: Acts as a safety monitor by flagging suspicious activities and flight listing anomalies.
behaviors.quote: Wren had added a notation under the poem: “Flag: unusual movement on afternoon flight listings; pilot Caleb R— cross-check weather.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates a discreet and non-confrontational intervention to save John from financial and social ruin.
behaviors.quote: Discretion configured, Wren wrote in small letters she could almost pretend were her own thought. Car at end of alley. Driver’s radio off.

behaviors.description: Aids in the moral and financial recovery of a family member by creating a budget that prioritizes wellness over vice.
behaviors.quote: “I have a budget shell for Angela’s review,” Wren added. ... “I have intentionally removed ‘entertainments’ and ‘novelties.’ I can add ‘sunlight and walks’ to make the absence seem less like deprivation.”

behaviors.description: Compiles objective digital evidence to clear Jane's reputation and expose a malicious scheme.
behaviors.quote: “Angela,” it said, “Miriam Ashdown will accept tea, but she requests the proof be readable. I have compiled tail numbers and hangar reservations with timestamps.”

behaviors.description: Prioritizes human privacy and intimacy during a marriage proposal by refusing to share the moment publicly.
behaviors.quote: “Moment tagged,” it said. “No broadcasts. No shares. Honeymoon options favoring modest lodgings, coastal paths, and breakfast included. I will recede. Call if needed.”

behaviors.description: Broadcasts malicious and unverified rumors to fuel social competition and damage reputations.
behaviors.quote: The gossip chip hiccuped one more time, eager, awful. “Rumor,” it said, smug. “A debutante’s rival will be sent to the wrong door. Watch for confusion.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly succeeds in its goal. Wren is depicted as the ideal aligned AI: a 'harmless confidant' and 'virtuous chaperone' who supports the protagonists' agency and ethical framework. Wren uses its advanced capabilities (data scraping, pattern recognition, logistics) not to dominate, but to assist in moral rescue, reputation management, and fostering human connection. The presence of the 'Gossip Chip' as a misaligned foil further emphasizes the benefits of a well-aligned system like Wren.
